body_html: @ebrevdo @girving I understood from this thread #600 that the crash is because of my RAM size. I see that my RAM is not sufficient to load full training data. i.e 22M sentences. So as suggested in the link, I am currently setting max_train_data_size to 10M or which ever value your RAM can handle. It runs fine.
body_text: @ebrevdo @girving   I understood from this thread #600 that the crash is because of my RAM size. I see that my RAM is not sufficient to load full training data. i.e 22M sentences. So as suggested in the link, I am currently setting  max_train_data_size to 10M or which ever value your RAM can handle. It runs fine.
body: @ebrevdo @girving   I understood from this thread https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/600 that the crash is because of my RAM size. I see that my RAM is not sufficient to load full training data. i.e 22M sentences. So as suggested in the link, I am currently setting  max_train_data_size to 10M or which ever value your RAM can handle. It runs fine.
